de.fraunhofer.iais.eis

Enum UsagePolicyClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<UsagePolicyClass>
      • de.fraunhofer.iais.eis.UsagePolicyClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<UsagePolicyClass>

    public enum UsagePolicyClass
extends java.lang.Enum<UsagePolicyClass>
    "Usage policy class"@en "Defined usage policy classes in the IDS."@en

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ALLOW_DATA_USAGE
      "Allow data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific Data Consumer, regardless of how many connectors they have and without any further usage restriction."@en
      APPLICATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "System restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific system or application inside an IDS Connector."@en
      ATTACH_POLICY_FOR_THIRD_PARTY
      "Remote notification"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to notify a specific party about the data usage."@en
      CONNECTOR_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Connector restricted data usage"@en "This policy restrict the usage of the data to a specific IDS connector."@en
      DATA_RENTAL
      "Data rental"@en "This policy restricts transfer of data in return for a monthly fee.
      DISTRIBUTE_ONLY_IF_ENCRYPTED
      "Distribute only if encrypted"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to encrypt the data asset before distribution."@en
      DURATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Duration restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific duration."@en
      EVENT_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Event restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific events.\n\t\t\t\t\tThe ODRL language defines an identified event as a context for exercising the action of the Rule.
      INTERVAL_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Interval restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific (time) interval."@en
      LOCAL_LOGGING
      "Local logging"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to log prior specified processes, such as the data access."@en
      LOCATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Location restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific location, e.g., expressed via location areas, geographic points or geographic bounding polygons."@en
      MODIFY_DATA_IN_REST
      "Modfy data in rest"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data before permission to use the data is granted.
      MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT
      "Modfy data in transit"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data when it is leaving the Data Provider connector or when it is entering the Data Consumer connector"@en
      PREPATUAL_DATA_SALE
      "Prepatual data sale"@en "This policy restricts the transfer of a Data Asset against a one-off payment in a given currency."@en
      PURPOSE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Purpose restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific purposes."@en
      REMOTE_NOTIFICATION
      "Remote notification"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to notify a specific party about the data usage."@en
      RESTRICTED_NUMBER_OF_USAGES
      "Restricted number of usages"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to numeric count of executions of actions.
      ROLE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      "Role restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific role.
      SECURITY_LEVEL_RESTRICTED_POLICY
      "Security level restricted policy"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to a security level the consumer must conform to."@en
      STATE_RESTRICTED_POLICY
      "State restricted policy"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific states.
      USE_DATA_AND_DELETE_AFTER
      "Use data and delete after"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to delete the asset after usage."@en

      • DATA_RENTAL

        public static final UsagePolicyClass DATA_RENTAL
        "Data rental"@en "This policy restricts transfer of data in return for a monthly fee. The ending is not specified. Nevertheless, the policy ends when a notice of termination has been made by any of the policy partners."@en

      • EVENT_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass EVENT_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        "Event restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific events.\n\t\t\t\t\tThe ODRL language defines an identified event as a context for exercising the action of the Rule. \n\t\t\t\t\tEvents are temporal periods of time. A Data Provider may want to restrict the usage of the data to a specific event when the exact time and date of the event is not clear in advance. \n\t\t\t\t\tTherefore, the event condition can be specified in a policy."@en

      • INTERVAL_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass INTERVAL_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        "Interval restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific (time) interval."@en

        "Location restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific location, e.g., expressed via location areas, geographic points or geographic bounding polygons."@en

      • MODIFY_DATA_IN_REST

        public static final UsagePolicyClass MODIFY_DATA_IN_REST
        "Modfy data in rest"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data before permission to use the data is granted. \n\t\t\t\t\tIn contrast to the idsc:MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT policy class, it demands the modifications to be done when data is stored."@en

      • MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT

        public static final UsagePolicyClass MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT
        "Modfy data in transit"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data when it is leaving the Data Provider connector or when it is entering the Data Consumer connector"@en

      • RESTRICTED_NUMBER_OF_USAGES

        public static final UsagePolicyClass RESTRICTED_NUMBER_OF_USAGES
        "Restricted number of usages"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to numeric count of executions of actions. \n\t\t\t\t\tA mechanism is needed that counts the usage of data in order to enforce the policy."@en

      • ROLE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass ROLE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        "Role restricted data usage"@en "This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific role. \n\t\t\t\t\tFor example, you can instantiate a policy of this class that allows only the members of the engineering department to use your data. \n\t\t\t\t\tThis policy class faces few limitations, i.e., in order to evaluate the conditions, it requires that the user roles are available and follow a common vocabulary"@en

      • SECURITY_LEVEL_RESTRICTED_POLICY

        public static final UsagePolicyClass SECURITY_LEVEL_RESTRICTED_POLICY
        "Security level restricted policy"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to a security level the consumer must conform to."@en

      • STATE_RESTRICTED_POLICY

        public static final UsagePolicyClass STATE_RESTRICTED_POLICY
        "State restricted policy"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific states. Possible states include, for example, that the contract for the given data asset has not yet expired."@en

      • USE_DATA_AND_DELETE_AFTER

        public static final UsagePolicyClass USE_DATA_AND_DELETE_AFTER
        "Use data and delete after"@en "This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to delete the asset after usage."@en
